description: Variation of planning condition 2 (approved plans) to allow for minor material amendments to planning permission ref: PP/2014/0681 dated 20/06/2014 for construction of a single storey plant room building and an  external open plant and machinery compound (containing generators, fuel storage tanks, chillers and transformers) to the north of the main building, a single storey plant room building with a swan neck connection to the main building and an adjoining enclosed external open plant compound (containing generators, fuel storage tanks and transformers), to the west of the main building, alterations to the existing east plant building to include external cooling plant, new external lighting and fencing and temporary plant and machinery compounds to the north, east and west of the main building (following the removal of existing external plant and machinery) -  To allow for  amendments to the design of the west power house and north plant room compound together with variations to planning conditions 4 (Materials and Finishes  Plant Rooms and Compounds), 6 (Hard and soft landscaping) and 9 (Ecology) to allow for works to be carried out in accordance with details of materials, landscaping and ecology which have been submitted with this application.
